subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: Top part of the character {{l|ko|為}} or {{l|ko|爲|tr=wi}}, which have the hun-reading {{ko-l|하다}}, from {{w|Middle Korean}} {{l|mko|ᄒᆞ다|tr=hota}}.

subSections.title: Particle
subSections.text:
{{ko-pos|particle|hangeul=하|y=ha|rv=ha|mr=ha}}

#''[[kwukyel|Kwukyel]] form of'' {{ko-l|하}} < {{m|mko|ᄒᆞ|tr=ho}}, word stem of {{ko-l|하다|to do ''(suffix to make verbs)'', to be ''(suffix to make adjectives)''}}
